files.patch: @@ -61,3 +61,4 @@ - * Note that in the Java Programming Language, a type annotation ({@jls 9.7.4}) - * only includes the {@linkplain #annotation() annotation} without {@link #targetInfo - * targetInfo} or {@link #targetPath targetPath}. + * Each instance of this structure corresponds to a type annotation ({@jls 9.7.4}) + * in the Java Programming Language; but in addition to the {@linkplain #annotation() + * annotation}, this structure also encodes information that locates {@linkplain + * #targetInfo the type} and {@linkplain #targetPath the annotated part} of the type. @@ -173,1 +174,1 @@ - * is annotated} + * is annotated} This models the {@code target_type} and {@code target_info} items.
